abstract: Annual amfAR Gala, which serves as unofficial kick-off to New York Fashion Week, draws countless celebrities and raises $2.25 million for AIDS research.
lead_paragraph: The event, which honored Rosario Dawson, Harry Belafonte and Patrick Demarchelier, raised $2.25 million for AIDS research.

headline.main: The AmfAR Gala: The Right Place, Just in Time
headline.print_headline: The Right Place, Just in Time

snippet: The event, which honored Rosario Dawson, Harry Belafonte and Patrick Demarchelier, raised $2.25 million for AIDS research.

keywords.value: amfAR, The Foundation for AIDS Research
